net.dean.jraw.auth

Interface TokenStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApatheticTokenStore, RefreshTokenHandler, VolatileTokenStore

    public interface TokenStore
    Generalized interface for storing API tokens in a key-value fashion. Specifically, API tokens such as a refresh or access token. Reading and writing actions have the ability to be blocking and should be treated as such.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isStored(java.lang.String key)
      Checks if a token is already stored
      java.lang.String readToken(java.lang.String key)
      Gets a token.
      void writeToken(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String token)
      Writes a token.

    • Method Detail

        java.lang.String readToken(java.lang.String key)
                           throws NoSuchTokenException
        Gets a token. If none is found, then a NoSuchTokenException is thrown
        Throws:
        NoSuchTokenException - If the given key does not have a value

        Writes a token.
